#Database configuration connection details

database.driver=oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver
database.host=vmpsaorcldlv
database.port=1521
database.user=ppk
database.password=Q_Ek2hs4RQ

# Oracle specific parameters
database.sid=PSTHADLV

# Database config for performance
database.fetchsize=1000
database.sqllength=4000

#Project settings
# Y tables usage
flattening.use.YP=false
flattening.use.YD=false

# The synergy project
synproject=THALER~PRG
flattening.environment.code=PSAPRG
# Force the transfer
force.transfer.member=true
# The CCS type
unflattening.ccs.switch.name=swit03
# Unflattening mode
unflattening.mode=jdbc
unflattening.manual=n
# scmflattening server
flattening.server=SYN

# Filtering files
filtering.exclude=/opt/scm/scmtools/project/prg/unix-filter-exclude.lst
filtering.include=/opt/scm/scmtools/project/prg/unix-filter-include.lst
filtering.member_types=/opt/scm/scmtools/project/prg/unix-filter-member_types.lst
filtering.techgroups=/opt/scm/scmtools/project/prg/unix-filter-techgroups.lst

# Companies
product.company.default=1
product.company.list=1

# Default location of memberdescription xml files
flattening.memberdescription.directory=memberdescription

# prompts update
flattening.update.prompts=true

# possibility to skip table inconsistent errors
scmflattening.inconsistency.error.enabled=true


# Optional : in order to limit the columns number in a file containing sql
# queries.
unflattening.file.maxcolumns=0

# Activate the CIC treatment.
unflattening.cic.enabled=true
